document.full_text: like the rest of the world, americans need to get used to the fact that judgments made on wall street or at the i.m.f. have more power to shape their economic futures than government decisions.
document.title: way of the world: unleashing an economic tsunami
lines_and_colors: like the rest of the world, americans need to get used to the fact that judgments made on wall street or at the i.m.f. have more power to shape their economic futures than government decisions.
